channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for GA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for GA

item.title: Report X-2023080116
item.description:
Report X-2023080116

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-10T21:10:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-31
  • City: AUSTELL
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: box was showing signs of leakage from the inner containers. Item was placed in a hazmat bag and tote and the propper PPE was used DescribePack: 1 loose cap leaked/wet box DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PPE was used box was placed immediately into the hazmat bag and totel

  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE FOUND LEAKING/WET IN THE LOADSIDE AREA. LEAKAGE DUE TO LOOSE BOTTLE CAPS. PACKAGE TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT AREA. DescribePack: CAPS OF ALL BOTTLES BECAME LOOSE DURING HANDLING. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: UPON DISCOVERY, PACKAGE WAS PLACED INTO HAZMAT BAG AND TAKEN TO THE HAZMAT AREA FOR PROCESSING.
